projects.title: Online Portfolio
projects.description: What you're seeing right now is my own online portfolio, containing links to my social media accounts, skillsets and samples of projects that are representative of my current skills.

projects.title: SwissAPO
projects.description: SwissAPO stands for Swiss Association of Professional Organizers. They wanted to have a new website and change the CMS (Content Management System) they were previously using. Following their brief and feedback, I created this website using Wordpress and some custom HTML and CSS.

projects.title: Film in Piazza - Intro
projects.description:
Film in Piazza is a young group of friends and film lovers. Every year they follow very closely the Locarno Film Festival, uploading daily vlogs and movie reviews on their social media platforms. I was commissioned to create an intro to be used at the beginning of their videos and this is the final result.
I wanted to create something slightly resambling the Disney Pixar lamp intro, but using elements from the movie industry world.
projects.presentation: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/FWUztyZtst4" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

projects.title: Teleticino - Index
projects.description: Teleticino is a local television channel based in Melide (Ticino, CH). I did an internship with them for a few months a couple years ago and this intro was created by me for a then-to-come-out format rebranding.
